1.Pros: I get to meet a lot of people. I also get a discount on my meals while on break.
1.Cons: There is no retirement and no vacation pay unless you are allowed to work a certain number of hours, which they dictate how many hours your allowed to work and if your under, you get no paid vacation. Plus when they have a system that's working and everyone's happy. They go and change it on you.

2.Pros: get to make many new friends and make the customers day better with just a smile. also its a fun fast paste job

7.Pros: You can put in Overtime. Unlike other jobs if youre paid hourly. Bonus is good if you make your monthly goals. If taken seriously this job can provide a good income. Advancement opportunities. Benefits. Free meals.
7.Cons: As a general manager its stressful. Mcdonalds is always changing procedures.

8.Pros: cooked french fries with chicken nuggets, it was awesome
